{{Wired embedded system |brand=NXP |model=IMX53QSB |revision=(MCIMX53-START-R) |asin=B00H99C3XM |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |price=149 |est_release_date=03/2011 |type=single-board computer, development board |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=i.MX53;MCIMX535D; |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=0 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41J128M16HA-15E:D |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), SATA, |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,, J15 |serial=yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=SMSC |eth_chip2_model=LAN8720A |lan_speed=10M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=RS-232 transciever;Sipex;SP3232EC;;1;,,, 3-Axis Accelerometer;Freescale Semiconductor;MMA8450;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Codec;Freescale Semiconductor;SGTL5000;;1;,,, 1MHz, 1.5A, Synchronous Buck Regulator;ON Semi;NCP1595A;;1;,,, |flags=Micro SD Card slots, Audio out (3.5mm), Mic (3.5mm), LVDS, VGA, accelerometer, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.08; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.35;Ubuntu 11.09; |tp_firmware=Debian |default_user=lucid |default_pass=lucid }} {{TagLine|i.MX53 Quick Start Board - Development Platform}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.nxp.com/design/development-boards/i-mx-evaluation-and-development-boards/i-mx53-quick-start-board:IMX53QSB}}
*[https://elinux.org/Freescale_IMX53QSB ''Freescale IMX53QSB'' on '''eLinux'''] *[https://wiki.debian.org/InstallingDebianOn/Freescale/i.MX53%20Quick%20Start%20board/debootstrap ''Installing Debian On Freescale i.MX53 QSB'' on '''Debian''' Wiki]
===News=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2011/03/01/low-cost-freescale-i-mx53-cortex-a8-development-board/ ''Freescale i.MX53 (Cortex-A8) Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale (NXP)]]'' i.MX53 (MCIMX535D) :@1.0GHz Single-core [[ARM]] (Cortex-A8) *Storage: SATA, Micro SD (TF) Card slots *RAM: 1GB (DDR3) @800MHz *Video Output: Supports VGA or LVDS *Audio Output: Analog (via 3.5mm) *Ports: 2x USB 2.0 (host), 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) *Power: DC 5V/2A (barrel plug)
===See also=== *[[Armadeus APF Boards]] • [https://elinux.org/Armadeus_APF_boards Spec.] *[[I.MX53 Quick Start Board|Freescale IMX53QSB]] • [https://elinux.org/Freescale_IMX53QSB Spec.] *[[Hammer Board]] • [https://elinux.org/Hammer_Board Spec.] *[[Leopard Board]] • [https://elinux.org/LeopardBoard Spec.] *[[Nail Board]] • [https://elinux.org/Nail_Board Spec.] *[[Real6410 SBC]] • [https://elinux.org/Real6410_Single_Board_Computer Spec.]
